matrix-project.description: Setup ubuntu make trusty job using ubuntu make trunk

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -eu
CONFIG_PATH=/tmp/config
# cleanup rm -rf ~/ubuntu-make* rm -rf ${CONFIG_PATH}
# add ppa for external content and git sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-desktop/ubuntu-make sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git sloccount
# clone from trunk cd ~ git clone https://github.com/ubuntu/ubuntu-make cd ubuntu-make UBUNTU_MAKE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
# install deps from debian/control sudo apt-get install -y $(tests/daily_runs/get_binary_depends ubuntu-make)
# install test packages testpackages=$(grep Depends debian/tests/control | tr -d , | tr -d @ | sed 's/Depends: //') sudo apt-get install -y $testpackages sudo addgroup $(whoami) docker
# ensure docker is using the CI proxy sudo bash -c 'echo export http_proxy="http://squid.internal:3128" >> /etc/default/docker.io' sudo restart docker
# config save mkdir ${CONFIG_PATH} cd ${CONFIG_PATH} echo -e "{\n 'target': 'trunk',\n 'version': '${UBUNTU_MAKE_VERSION}',\n 'date': {\n 'timestamp': '$(date +%s)',\n 'utc': '$(date -u)' },\n 'arch': '$(arch)'\n}" > ubuntu-make-version dpkg -l > packages_list
